column1: ekaba retlaepheha jwang retletsolele mme mamello
ehlile helang moroa tlisa ntho ena yaka
kumbakumba ya mme mamello ella hanyenyana
ebile nna ketlare mme amphe phofo
lieketseng nka ntho eno ya moroa uebetsetsa kwana
ke hobane ha adule lapeng tsebo
ke hobane ke hobane ha adule lapeng tsebo tsebo ke hobane odula habo
mona teng ke ha utseba ke eng
hobane mohlang wane onealetebele are leabua
ntseliseng oneale siyo hle u leshano
mohlang wane rekhibang mane mohla reebolang dierekisi
ntseliseng oneale teng hakere mme mamello
etlare ntate kentsekere kentsekephehile kenekere kephehe fishole
hobatla motho oafuthumatse metsi ana abatang
ketlaafuthumatsa ha letsatsi lena leitse qaaqaa feela
ha hona taba yaka entseele ena
tsebo mollo ola waka o kae
le bonang otenne penti le nna
ke mang yaitseng kebua le wena
tlosa leswai lahao kenke ntho yaka helang
kentsekearata ha ubone moo ha kesoanwe le moo ha kesoanwe
ha ubone le moo u khopane
le nna ketlohlwa keya haka kwana
esale ha kele kapa ha kele tjena
ha kesekebotsa mme ntho engwe ke ena
ae ke yona etswileng eno ya mme
